bibl.title: 'Generic Games' in Callimachus' Aetia.
bibl.note: 1. Genre in the Aetia. - 2. Three kinds of 'generic games': 2.1. Aitia presented in the form of a specific genre; - 2.2. Aitia where an extended passage recalls a specific genre; - 2.3. Shorter passages which refer the reader to another genre. - 3. Conclusion. References.
bibl.seg: HARDER M. Annette, 'Generic Games' in Callimachus' Aetia.
M. Annette HARDER, Remco F. REGTUIT and Gerry C. WAKKER (Edd.), Genre in Hellenistic Poetry = Hellenistica Groningana. 3 (Groningen, 1998) pp. 95-113
